headline: The Bull Case For Voya Financial (VOYA) Could Change Following Strategic AI-Powered Partnership With Workday
summary: Earlier this week, Workday announced that Voya Financial has been named a Strategic Workday Wellness Partner for Health, integrating Voya’s Employee Benefit Supplemental Health and Retirement solutions with Workday Wellness to offer enhanced, AI-powered benefits administration for employers and employees. This collaboration marks a meaningful step for Voya in aligning its workplace benefits strategy with cutting-edge digital tools and actionable insights designed to improve personalization...

headline: Klaviyo Appoints Chano Fernández as Interim Executive Officer to Guide AI, International Growth
summary: Klaviyo Inc. (NYSE:KVYO) is one of the best IPO tech stocks to buy now. On August 29, Klaviyo announced the appointment of Chano Fernández as its Interim Executive Officer, effective September 1. Fernández is a current board member and has a background in scaling enterprise software organizations, with previous executive roles at Eightfold.ai and Workday. […]
